issue.title: [Rust] Improve some kernels with autovectorisation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7460](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7460). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In a comment to an open ticket for optimising a cast kernel by using SIMD, `[~andy-thomason]`  mentioned that LLVM does autovec well for Rust.

I'd like to explore whether we could improve the kernel performance by simplifying the loops enough to allow the compiler to vectorise.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7460?focusedCommentId=17002391) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6086
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6086>
